name: omp-express-mongo-api
description: Open Media Portal API express/mongo implementation

scripts.coverage: OMP_CONFIG_PATH=./.travis-omp-config.yml OMP_MONGO_HOST=$(docker inspect -f '{{ .NetworkSettings.IPAddress }}' $(docker ps | grep ompexpressmongoapi_omp-mongo | awk  '{print $1}')) OMP_LIBRARY_ROOT=$(pwd) OMP_API_PORT=8002 NODE_ENV=coverage multi='dot=- html-cov=coverage.html' ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --require blanket --reporter mocha-multi
